titles.title: Are you washed in the blood?

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 v1 v2 v3 v1 v4 v3

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Are you washed in the blood,
In the soul cleansing

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
blood of the Lamb?
Are your garments spotless?

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Are they white as snow?
Are you washed
in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Have you been to Jesus
for the cleansing power?

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Are you washed
in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Are you fully trusting
in His grace this hour?

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Are you walking daily by the Saviour’s side?
Are you washed

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
in the blood of the Lamb?
Do you rest each

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
moment in the Crucified?
Are you washed
in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
When the Bridegroom cometh
will your robes be white?

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Will your soul be ready
for the mansions bright,

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
And be washed
in the blood of the Lamb?

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Lay aside the garments
that are stained with sin,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
There’s a fountain flowing
for the soul unclean,

verse.name: v4c
verse.lines:
O be washed
in the blood of the Lamb
